titleStmt.title: A dyaloge describing the originall grou[n]d of these Lutheran faccyons, and many of theyr abusys, compyled by syr wyllyam Barlow chanon
Dyaloge descrybyng the orygynall ground of these Lutheran faccyons, and many of theyr abusys.
titleStmt.author: Barlow, William, d. 1568.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete agaynst the condyte the 28 daye of Iuly the yere of oure lorde. 1531 by Wyllyam Rastell wyth the pryuylege of our souereyn lord kyng Henry [the] .viii. [and] no ma[y] prynt [the] same agayn withi[n] [the] space of .vii. yere next e[n]suing,
